thread.title: LG G6 case renders reveal the phone from all angles
thread.title_full: LG G6 case renders reveal the phone from all angles

title: LG G6 case renders reveal the phone from all angles
text:
LG G6 case renders reveal the phone from all angles LG G6 case renders reveal the phone from all angles By February 6, 2017 “The LG G6 will sport dual cameras, a fingerprint sensor and a 3.5mm headphone jack” 
Last week, an alleged live image of the upcoming LG G6 flagship was leaked, which gave us a close look at the back panel of the phone. Now the device has leaked once again in a bunch of renders from casemaker Ringke. The newly leaked photos reveal a design similar to the one in the previously leaked photos. 
The Ringke case renders reveal that the LG G6 will sport dual cameras at the rear with a dual-LED flash. The phone will get a fingerprint sensor that’s located right below the cameras. It will come with a 3.5mm headphone jack and a USB Type-C port. The handset will not feature any physical buttons on the front, and will rely on on-screen navigation buttons. 
The LG G6 is expected to go official at the company’s pre-MWC event on February 26th. We will be at the floor in Barcelona to bring you all the official details regarding the phone’s price, specs and availability, so stay tuned.
